topic: Impact of prompt shuffling on creative processes in the energy sector
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling my prompts can uncover new patterns, themes, and connections that lead to more innovative and insightful ideas. As a next step, I will dedicate time each week to systematically shuffle and experiment with my existing prompts, documenting any new narratives or creative insights that emerge. This practice will not only enhance my creative process but also provide opportunities for self-reflection on my thought patterns and assumptions.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
